h1: Calories in One Pound Ground Beef
assumptions: 80% lean/20% fat ground beef, pan-broiled (cooked), excess fat drained; approximately 454 g per pound.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by fat percentage, cooking method, draining, brand, and portion accuracy. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One pound of cooked 80% lean ground beef provides ~1117 kcal and ~110 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one pound of 80% lean ground beef?
faqs.a: About 1117 kcal when cooked and drained.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one pound ground beef?
faqs.a: Approximately 110 g protein for cooked 80% lean.

faqs.q: Does fat content affect calories in ground beef?

faqs.q: Are these values for raw or cooked ground beef?

faqs.q: How much fat is in one pound ground beef?
faqs.a: About 70 g total fat, including 27 g saturated, for 80% lean cooked.
